product: Pampers Premium Care Pants, Large size baby Diapers, (L) 88 Count,9-14 Kg, Softest ever Pampers Pants
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Exceptional Comfort and Protection
body:
I recently switched to Pampers Premium Pants for my little one, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. These diapers offer unmatched comfort and protection, making them an absolute game-changer for both my baby and me.First and foremost, the fit of these pants is fantastic. The elastic waistband ensures a snug yet gentle fit, providing my baby with freedom of movement without any discomfort. Plus, the stretchy sides make changing time a breeze, even with my little wiggle worm.In terms of absorbency, Pampers Premium Pants truly shine. The extra-absorbent core quickly locks away wetness, keeping my baby's skin dry and rash-free for extended periods. Whether it's during the day or throughout the night, these diapers offer reliable leakage protection, giving me peace of mind knowing that my baby stays comfortable and dry.Another aspect that sets Pampers Premium Pants apart is their breathability. The soft and breathable materials allow for air circulation, preventing any stuffiness or irritation, especially during hot summer days. It's incredible to see how these diapers prioritize not only absorption but also the overall comfort of my little one's delicate skin.Furthermore, I appreciate the thoughtful design features, such as the wetness indicator, which makes it easy to know when it's time for a diaper change. The cute prints are also a delightful touch, adding a bit of fun to an everyday essential.Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend Pampers Premium Pants to all parents looking for premium-quality diapers for their little ones. With their unbeatable comfort, superior absorbency, and thoughtful design, these diapers have become a staple in our household. Trust me; you won't be disappointed!
Read more

product: Pampers Premium Care Pants, Large size baby Diapers, (L) 88 Count,9-14 Kg, Softest ever Pampers Pants
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Ultimate Comfort and Protection for Your Baby
body:
I recently tried the New Pampers Premium Care Pants for my baby, and I am extremely satisfied with their performance.**Pros:**- **360-Degree Cottony Softness:** These pants are incredibly soft, providing ultimate comfort for my baby throughout the day and night.- **Soothing Lotion with Aloe Vera:** The inclusion of Aloe Vera helps protect my baby's skin from rashes, which is a huge relief.- **Breathable Design:** The 10 million micropores allow my baby's skin to breathe, preventing any irritation or discomfort.- **12-Hour Leak Lock:** The leak lock feature keeps my baby dry for up to 12 hours, ensuring they stay comfortable and happy.- **Wetness Indicator:** The Wetness Indicator is a great added feature, turning from yellow to blue to signal when it's time for a diaper change.- **Easy Disposal:** The disposal tape makes it convenient to dispose of the used diaper without any hassle.Pampers Premium Care Pants come in various sizes, from New-born (NB) to XXL, ensuring a perfect fit for every stage of your baby's growth. Overall, these pants offer 5-star comfort and protection, making them an excellent choice for any parent.

product: Pampers Premium Care Pants, Large size baby Diapers, (L) 88 Count,9-14 Kg, Softest ever Pampers Pants
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
My child Loves Pampers Premium Pants
body:
"I cannot recommend Pampers Premium Care diapers highly enough! As a father, I prioritize my child's comfort and health above all else. When my little one started showing signs of rashes, I knew I had to make a change. That's when I switched to Pampers Premium Care, and I'm so glad I did.The first thing I noticed was the incredibly soft feel of these diapers. They are so gentle and smooth, almost like a cloth diaper. Unlike other brands that can feel harsh and synthetic, these diapers are a dream to touch.Not only are they soft, but they are also super absorbent and keep my baby dry and comfortable for hours. The wetness indicator is a game-changer, making it easy to know when it's time for a change. Plus, the diapers have a great fit and don't sag, even after hours of wear.Overall, Pampers Premium Care diapers have exceeded my expectations. They have helped keep my baby rash-free and happy, and I wouldn't trust any other brand. Thank you, Pampers, for creating such a fantastic product!"

product: Chicco Toothpaste (Strawberry), 50 ml twin pack ( 2 paste of 50ml each)
title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Good toothpaste, crappy toothbrush
body:
Chicco is the only toothpaste that my son likes. This listing is a decent offer especially because this is in prime. The Chicco toothpastes that I received seems genuine with expiry date of July 2019 and with the seal intact. I am taking away one star because of the way the seller is misleading customers with the free toothbrush. The toothbrush that they send is not even for kids or toddlers - its practically adult size or atleast suited only for big kids who have outgrown their Chicco days. This is a made in China toothbrush with no price information anywhere in the packaging and . If your only reason to go for this listing is the toothbrush, then please dont fall for it. I have attached a few images which shows the correct size of the toothbrush.I seriously dont understand why the seller has added this toothbrush in this offer. That would be the one reason for bringing down the rating for this listing because it absolutely does not match the expectations set by the product image.
Read more

product: StarAndDaisy 360° Baby Walker Adjustable Height, Multi-Function Anti-Rollover Folding Walker with Height Adjustable 6-18 M...
title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
Fatal product, don't ever buy. This product should be banned
body:
The seat provided does not match the one shown in photo of product. It is so thin material and narrow that my baby slipped inside and was stuck in the neck. The plastic used is of cheap quality and has small chips and pieces which is dangerously out so that babies can consume. The product seemed used and with lot of scratches. I raised a replacement since return was not available, hoping that at least now they send me the original seat shown in description, but no, they again sent this duplicate cheap quality seat. I really want to return this but I don't see an option to. I highly don't recommend this product, waste of money and more than money it would have proved fatal for my kid with its dangerously cheap quality seat.

product: HUG 'n' FEEL SOFT TOYS Teddy Bear, Soft Toys, Teddy Bear 3 feet for Girls, Birthday Gift for Girls, Birthday Gift, Boyfrie...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
hug to make everything feel right.
body:
Title: A Heartfelt Embrace: The 6-Foot Hug N Feel Teddy Bear Plush ReviewIn a world where warmth and comfort often take a backseat to the fast pace of life, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys emerge as a delightful oasis of serenity and affection. At the heart of this review lies a 6-foot teddy bear plush, a gift of unparalleled sentiment that graced the life of my beloved wife. With an array of captivating features, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys proved to be more than just an inanimate object; they became a source of genuine connection and heartwarming solace.**High-quality materials**: The Hug N Feel Soft Toys are a testament to craftsmanship and quality. Crafted from hypoallergenic materials, they envelop you in a sense of security and well-being. The plush fabric, chosen with care, ensures not only a soft touch but also resilience that stands the test of time.**Large size**: Standing at an impressive 6 feet, the Hug N Feel teddy bear is an embodiment of comfort on a grand scale. The substantial size is an invitation to embrace life's little joys, to find refuge in the simplest yet most profound of gestures - a heartfelt hug.**Variety of designs**: A symphony of designs and colors grace the Hug N Feel collection. From endearing teddy bears that remind us of cherished childhood memories to charming animals that awaken our playful spirit, the variety of options ensures that everyone finds a piece that resonates with their heart.**Ideal for gifting**: The act of gifting is an art, and the Hug N Feel Soft Toys make it a masterpiece. Perfect for occasions that mark milestones in life, these plush companions add an extra layer of warmth to celebrations. Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or a day devoted to love, these teddy bears transcend materialism, offering a tangible representation of love and affection.**Versatile use**: Beyond their role as cuddly companions, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys showcase versatility that expands their purpose. A pillow to rest upon, a backrest to ease tired muscles, or a companion to keep loneliness at bay during travels – these plush wonders effortlessly adapt to the needs of the moment.**Easy to clean**: Life's messiness should never hinder our connection with the things we love. The Hug N Feel Soft Toys understand this sentiment and emerge victorious in their battle against dirt and grime. With the convenience of both hand and machine washing, their quick drying fabric ensures that they are always ready to provide the comfort we seek.**Suitable for all ages**: The ability to forge connections knows no age limit, and neither does the charm of the Hug N Feel Soft Toys. From the very young to the young at heart, these plush companions bridge generational gaps, uniting us under a common desire for affection and companionship.**Hypoallergenic**: In a world where allergies and sensitivities are becoming increasingly prevalent, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys prioritize safety without compromising on comfort. Free from harmful chemicals, they open their arms to everyone, ensuring that no one is denied the joy of a genuine hug.**Affordable price**: Love, warmth, and comfort should not be confined by economic boundaries. The affordability of the Hug N Feel Soft Toys is a testament to their commitment to making the world a cozier place, one bear hug at a time. The accessible price tag ensures that the gift of a warm embrace remains within reach for all.**Loveable and huggable**: There is a palpable warmth that emanates from the Hug N Feel Soft Toys. They transform into more than just objects, becoming conduits of emotion and connection. Whether as a comforting presence during a stormy night or a partner in celebrating life's triumphs, these plush companions seamlessly embody the essence of love, affection, and companionship.In conclusion, the 6-foot Hug N Feel teddy bear plush is not just a gift; it's an embodiment of emotion, connection, and comfort. From its premium materials to its versatile use, this plush companion weaves itself into the tapestry of our lives, reminding us of the power of a warm embrace. As the world continues to spin with its relentless pace, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys stand as a steadfast reminder that sometimes, all we need is a hug to make everything feel right.

These diapers have not caused any rashes for our baby, which is a big plus.However, I've noticed some inconsistency in their performance. Occasionally, they leak from the sides, while other times they work well. Also the elastic area occasionally leaves mark on skin. These diapers need to be changed at least once during the night.

product: HUG 'n' FEEL SOFT TOYS Panda Teddy, Panda 3 Feet, Soft Toys, Teddy Bear 3 Feet for Girls, Soft Toys for Kids, Birthday Gif...
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
hug to make everything feel right.
body:
Title: A Heartfelt Embrace: The 6-Foot Hug N Feel Teddy Bear Plush ReviewIn a world where warmth and comfort often take a backseat to the fast pace of life, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys emerge as a delightful oasis of serenity and affection. At the heart of this review lies a 6-foot teddy bear plush, a gift of unparalleled sentiment that graced the life of my beloved wife. With an array of captivating features, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys proved to be more than just an inanimate object; they became a source of genuine connection and heartwarming solace.**High-quality materials**: The Hug N Feel Soft Toys are a testament to craftsmanship and quality. Crafted from hypoallergenic materials, they envelop you in a sense of security and well-being. The plush fabric, chosen with care, ensures not only a soft touch but also resilience that stands the test of time.**Large size**: Standing at an impressive 6 feet, the Hug N Feel teddy bear is an embodiment of comfort on a grand scale. The substantial size is an invitation to embrace life's little joys, to find refuge in the simplest yet most profound of gestures - a heartfelt hug.**Variety of designs**: A symphony of designs and colors grace the Hug N Feel collection. From endearing teddy bears that remind us of cherished childhood memories to charming animals that awaken our playful spirit, the variety of options ensures that everyone finds a piece that resonates with their heart.**Ideal for gifting**: The act of gifting is an art, and the Hug N Feel Soft Toys make it a masterpiece. Perfect for occasions that mark milestones in life, these plush companions add an extra layer of warmth to celebrations. Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or a day devoted to love, these teddy bears transcend materialism, offering a tangible representation of love and affection.**Versatile use**: Beyond their role as cuddly companions, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys showcase versatility that expands their purpose. A pillow to rest upon, a backrest to ease tired muscles, or a companion to keep loneliness at bay during travels – these plush wonders effortlessly adapt to the needs of the moment.**Easy to clean**: Life's messiness should never hinder our connection with the things we love. The Hug N Feel Soft Toys understand this sentiment and emerge victorious in their battle against dirt and grime. With the convenience of both hand and machine washing, their quick drying fabric ensures that they are always ready to provide the comfort we seek.**Suitable for all ages**: The ability to forge connections knows no age limit, and neither does the charm of the Hug N Feel Soft Toys. From the very young to the young at heart, these plush companions bridge generational gaps, uniting us under a common desire for affection and companionship.**Hypoallergenic**: In a world where allergies and sensitivities are becoming increasingly prevalent, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys prioritize safety without compromising on comfort. Free from harmful chemicals, they open their arms to everyone, ensuring that no one is denied the joy of a genuine hug.**Affordable price**: Love, warmth, and comfort should not be confined by economic boundaries. The affordability of the Hug N Feel Soft Toys is a testament to their commitment to making the world a cozier place, one bear hug at a time. The accessible price tag ensures that the gift of a warm embrace remains within reach for all.**Loveable and huggable**: There is a palpable warmth that emanates from the Hug N Feel Soft Toys. They transform into more than just objects, becoming conduits of emotion and connection. Whether as a comforting presence during a stormy night or a partner in celebrating life's triumphs, these plush companions seamlessly embody the essence of love, affection, and companionship.In conclusion, the 6-foot Hug N Feel teddy bear plush is not just a gift; it's an embodiment of emotion, connection, and comfort. From its premium materials to its versatile use, this plush companion weaves itself into the tapestry of our lives, reminding us of the power of a warm embrace. As the world continues to spin with its relentless pace, the Hug N Feel Soft Toys stand as a steadfast reminder that sometimes, all we need is a hug to make everything feel right.

body:

It's tooooo small for even a 6 months old baby.Baby cannot enjoy sitting in this seat. Because, it's so small and uncomfortable that the baby feels the legs stuck if we make them sit as on that like sofa seat and if the baby tries to comfort and help with better position, by stretching legs, the legs either come out from beneath the car or the baby gets restless which can make the baby fall.The stitching is also not that great it has opened from down.But, ya I have observed that the baby enjoys laying on it say for 5/10 minutes.Yes, the look, design, colour combination and the imitation of actual car is exact and attractive enough.It's not a pleasure purchase its only for the sake of outer look.It must be redesigned with more space and comfort for better results.

body:
After lot of research I came across to this product and based on the review I made my purchase. After using it for a week here are view on this product. I also tried U shape pillow which is is not that comfortable compared to G shape.Here are few points that I liked about this product and some that I see a room for improvement.Pros:1. The G shape pillow is very comfortable.2. The quality of the product fabric, stiching is nice.Cons:1. Price is bit higher compared to reputed brands like wakefit2. The fiber inside the pillow should be more around 3 kg. Currently as per description its 2.1 kg. This is needed as over time the fiber tend to shrink and may not be as comfortable as it is today.3. Should provide extra fiber for height adjustment like wakefit does.Overall I am happy with my purchase as I  wanted specifically G shape pillow which is not available from other reputed brand.

product: Mother Sparsh 98% Water Based Scented Wipes I Plant derived Fabric I mild Scented I 80 Pcs/Pack - Pack of 5
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Genuinely Good Quality Wipes. Go ahead and Buy them.
body:
This  is a three set pack with 80 wipes each in a pack from a brand which is a  comparatively lesser known brand per say in the market. However on trying the product the quality of the product was appealing and distinctively good.  The detailed review is as given belowPros:1.The wipes are large and strong and unlike some brands do not tear up easily and does not leave loose threads cotton after wiping and that's a good part which i liked.2. The scent is mild and gentle and long staying so one one hand it does not irritates the child and on the other it it stays for long.3. The moisture content is adequate.Though you may find a wipe or two on the top a little less  moist but don't worry that's natural for any pack. I have used a couple of them and found to be locked with moisture.4. The wipes have a moisturizer effect like that of a cream after wiping and does not leave the skin dry.5. The USP of the product is the kit bag they offer along which is an excellent quality product in itself. The bag can be used as a toiletries kit bag after one has used all the wipes. The quality of the transparent sheet on one side of the kit bag is also of an excellent quality and will not give up easily with time. The zip lock is also of an excellent quality. The size of the bag is also adequate.6. Another good thing which i found was the quality of the resealable sticker on top which was awesome. This is one aspect which most of the brands don't look into and once you open the pack the moisture evaporates after some time if the wipes are not used for some time.ConsThe only con which i see is the pricing which i feel is on the little higher side if you compare with the other brands available in the market. Other than 
Johnson's Baby Skincare Wipes, 2*80 cloth wipes (Pack of 2, Rs. 60 off)
 all other are available at cheaper prices than this one. you'll get 
Mee Mee Caring Baby Wet Wipes with Aloe Vera (72 pcs) (Pack of 3)
 at Rs 275 and 
Himalaya Herbals Gentle Baby Wipes (72 Sheets)
 at 402 for three packs. However having said that you also need to understand that these are a completely new range of wet wipes which are quality derived Ayurvedic products and hence ph balanced, alcohol free and Hypoallergenic (don’t irritate baby skin) with Aloevera. So one needs to pay the price for the quality. (You get the kit bag also along ;)SpecsSome of the specs listed on the pack are shown in attached photosPS: If you liked my review please hit “yes” below to encourage me to write more such reviews in future helping more people to take informed decisions.
Read more

product: Mother Sparsh 98% Water Based Scented Wipes I Plant derived Fabric I mild Scented I 80 Pcs/Pack - Pack of 5
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Natural ,soft,fragrant baby wipes !
body:
I find these wipes to be high quality  with nice fragrance.There are 80 wipes in each pack,There are total 3 packs , thus giving us 240 wet baby wipes.The packs(bundles) are neatly parcelled in a nylon bag which has atransparent window and a handle to carry the bag  around,say when you are travelling.Parents can  use these wet wipes, or  baby wipes,for wiping up baby vomit and to clean babies' hands and faces.Also useful  to cleanse the sensitive skin of infants.and  for wiping infants' bottoms in diaper changing,Content in each pack:====================80 wipes in each pack x 3 packswipe size 150 mmm x 200 mm rectangular sizetotal packs: 3Pros and features:=================(1) non-woven spunlace fabric(2) PH balanced(3) Alcohol free(4) 98% is water(5) Enriched with Vitamin E(6) Natural care with Aloe Vera extract(7) Rs 35 off on each pack, total Rs 105 on 3 packs. on MRP(8) Gently cleans the baby's skin without causing irritation and rashes,allergy and infections(9) Canbe used to clean the baby's skin,face,hands, vomit, baby's bottom while changing diapers etc.(10) Preservatives are used to prevent bacterial or fungal growth in the package(11) A sticker is provided on the pack  which canbe opened and closed againHow to take out the wipes=========================Use the openable sticker on the pack .It is the sticker where 35 Off is printed in red colourwith "open" marking.Open it, take out a wipe and then close the sticker to prevent drying of wipes.Do not cut  the package !Rs 103  discount on MRP on a pack of 3 bundles===========================================MRP  on each pack  195 x 3 packs = rs 585, discount offered Rs  35 on each pack x 3= Rs 105,net cost ES 480.What is in the wipe:the ingredients====================================(1) Purified water 98% content of wipe and the remaining 2% the following items:(2) Propylene glycol(3) Glycerin(4) Phenoxyethanol&Ethylhexyl Glycerin(5) Cocoamphodiacetate(6) polyaminopropyl biguanide(7) Aloe vera extract(8) Phenoxyethanol(9) Vitamin E(Tocopheryl Acetate)(10) Polysorbate 20(11) Fragrance(12) DTA Disodium(13) Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor oil(14) Jojoba oil(15) Lactic acid/TEAPrecautions===========(1) Avoid direct contact with eyes(2) Ensure that children do not swallow or chew wipes(3) after using them  Do  not flush wipes with water  as they clog the drainage pipes(4) so Dispose off  used wipes only in waste basket/bin(5) Avoid sunlight and high temp to avoid drying of the wipes.Stor ein col dry place(6) Close the reusable sticker after use (openable and closable sticker is on the pack)(7) Use within 24 months from the date of manufacturing printed onthe pack(8) when flushed into toilets have been known to clog internal plumbing, septic systems, and public sewer systemThe technique:=============nonwoven spun-lace fabric where fibres are intermingled with hydro entanglementthrough very high pressure of water.Water is preserved in the fabric.Manufactured by:=================Mothe rsparsh baby care pvt ltd886,sector -7,Ambala city,Haryana-134003,IndiaCustomer care:=============24 x 7 helpline -Tel: 0171-3055255email: info@mothersparsh.comI definitely recommend these baby wipes for all parents to take care of their infants.

product: SuperBottoms NEW UNO Freesize Cloth Diaper | Cloth diaper for babies 0 to 3 years | Washable & Reusable cloth diaper | Com...
title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
DO NOT BUY THIS!! It's a scam!
body:
I started thinking of buying cloth diapers, when my baby crossed six months. It was hard to ignore Super Bottom brand, as they had their presence in every inch of social media. Still I did my research. Essentially there are two parts in a cloth diaper- one outer water proof cover and an insert. The exterior of water proof cover, as it rightly says, is water proof, which means, there will no longer be any soaking of bed. I am not sure which fabric is used in the making of the exterior. The inner layer of the outer cover is a soft fleece, to be precise - micro fleece fabric. Micro fleece is a synthetic material (unlike cotton which is a natural fabric). Whether micro fleece is safe for babies is a controversial topic. It may be safer, if it is used as a blanket or a sweater. But how about it coming into close contact with the genital areas of babies! Is it safe still? I doubt. Now, the second part which is the insert(soker pad). Generally inserts are of different kinds. In UNO diaper, it is a pre-fold made of cotton on three parts and a dry feel layer on the top. this layer absorbs the wet and still stay dry. This is the layer of the insert which comes into contact with baby's skin which again is made of micro fleece. (The video says a booster pad is part of UNO diaper, but I didn't receive it, despite paying 711/- INR). The insert needs to be snapped to the outer cover before putting it on baby (there are adjustable snap buttons). Now where is the scam? Let's compare the UNO diaper with Super Bottom Basic diapers. Before going to it, FYI, there are two types of Basic diapers - one with pocket and one wwithout pocket - In pocket diaper, you can tuck in the insert to the pocket which is provided in the outer cover of the diaper. This is a convenient option. The baby's skin comes into contact only with the inner layer of the outer cover and in no case with the insert that is tucked into the pocket. Whereas in the other type - ie one without pocket -you are expected to snap the insert to the outer cover (same is the case with UNO). The pocket diaper can also be used just like no-pocket diaper by placing the insert on the outer cover. Now what about UNO? Unlike the Basic diapers (both pocket and no pocket)there is only one line of snap buttons to adjust the waiste line in UNO (as a result, the waiste line never stays intact) and again in UNO there are no snap buttons at all to adjust the overall size of the diaper (depending on the weight of the babies- which is one convenient feature of Basic diaper). Now where is the scam? Basic diapers are two times cheaper than UNO. However the fabric used in both the types are similar. Moreover,  UNO is smaller in size than Basic (with no adjustable snap buttons to adjust the size- UNO has snap buttons only on the waiste line) and as I mentioned earlier, Basic has two lines of snap buttons on the waiste line which ensure that the diaper stay fit and intact despite baby moves around. Utility? UNO is a waste- it doesn't do the job. The outer cover gets socked easily in one pee. Pocket diapers function better than UNO and is more comfortable, as the insert does not come into direct contact with baby's skin. And you can tuck in any absorbant fabric inside the pocket- even a cotton towel. But here is the real scam- it is confirmed by the Super Bottom buddy( the person who gonna can reach out for questions) that they stopped the production of the pocket diapers- a better, functional, ergonomic, viable and CHEAPER option. But you will still find Super Bottom pocket diapers online and i myself ordered two combo packs from Amazon. One combo pack I received was fine but the other one which I received on the same day from the same seller was not with pockets. Same happened, when I ordered via Flipkart. And you know - these are non-returnable! When I approached this super Buddy of Super Bottom for recourse, she said she can't help as they stopped production of pocket diapers!! Then why the heck they feature pocket diapers online? Doesn't that mean, they are forcing their disfunctional design on the customers indirectly? Doesn't that amount to misrepresentation and fraud?Micro fleece layer of these Super Bottom diapers look really pathetic. I find Charlie Banana is a standard and way better option.
Read more

title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Reuse, cute prints goid absobency
body:
I cloth diapering my baby from birth. Initially i started with new born cover diapers along with disposables. I used cover diapers in day time n disposables for nite. As i m not confident enough to use  cloth diapers at nite. As my baby is heavy wetter. Then slowly i buildup my stash of superbottoms. N recently i bouth its rainbow twinkles uno. It has beautiful print. I use it at nite time n i realized its last for 8 to 9 hours .i like its performance as my baby is heavy wetter.I use its super nappies n its great for diaper free time. Super bottoms has so many products for babies but now they have product for new moms as well. Uno diapers from superbottoms has good absorbency. N it has dry layer feel. For extra dry feel we can uae fleece liners . Again fleece liners from superbottoms are an amazing product it is easy to clean poop . Fleece liners can save d diaper from poop. Superbottoms customer service is also very amazing as dey answer all ur queries. Uno from superbottoms are good for night time . Its eco friendly n pocket friendly as well. Initially its looks expensive because the superbottom diapers are little expensive as it looks but when we started using it i feel its good to invest for long time. We can reuse it again n again. N its safe n rash free  diapers .

body:
The cloth is cotton mix fleece kind of material and it is soft. It absorbs the wetness from the inside but all the wetness appears on the outside. The baby wont feel the wetness but anyone holding the baby or any surface where baby is placed will get wet. I would recommend using an external diaper cover or a waterproof sheet along with this. I use the superbottoms uno freesize cloth diaper  along with this. Instead of the cloth pad, i use the langot inside. product: CURATIO Tedibar Baby Bathing Bar, 75 g
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Worth buying..
body:
I recently tried the tedibar soap for my little one, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the results. As a parent, I am always on the lookout for products that are safe, effective, and gentle on my baby’s delicate skin, and this soap exceeded my expectations in every way.The only minor downside is that it is slightly more expensive than some other baby soaps on the market. However, given its quality and the fact that a little goes a long way, I find it to be worth the investment.Overall, Tedibar has become a staple in our baby care routine. It provides gentle cleansing without any worries about harmful ingredients, making bath time a more enjoyable and worry-free experience for both me and my baby. I highly recommend it to any parent looking for a reliable and safe baby soap.

product: motherly Women's Nylon Heavily Padded Wire Free Maternity Bra
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Good product quality
body:
Product quality is good, very soft fabric. I ordered the large size but exchange for one for Medium size as they dn’t have size chart adding this picture for you ladies so order according. Will rewrite  review after using medium size. I am not sure of my size anymore cus of pregnancy, large size also felt comfortable but little lose on the band side but cup size feels okay, I used to wear 36 D currently in my last trimester so will use one L and one M size.UPDATE - After using if for 8 months.Starting 4-5 months were good but after that the product started losing the elasticity but all in all it is still a decent product and comfortable nursing bra.

product: Cuddables 99% Water Baby Wipes | Natural Plant made cloth wipes - Super thick | 72pcs X 2 Packs = 144 Wet Baby Wipes
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Cuddables Water Baby Wipes - 3x Thicker, No Alcohol, 99% Water Wipes
body:
I recently had the opportunity to try out Cuddables Water Baby Wipes, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed with their performance. These wipes claim to be 3x thicker, contain no alcohol, and are made of 99% water, and they truly deliver on their promises. Here's my detailed review of these fantastic wipes.First and foremost, the thickness of these wipes is exceptional. The added thickness provides a sturdy and durable feel, allowing for more effective cleaning. I found that even with stubborn messes, the wipes held up well and didn't tear or fall apart easily. This is particularly important when dealing with messy diaper changes or wiping off food spills. The extra thickness provides peace of mind and ensures a thorough cleaning experience.One of the standout features of Cuddables Water Baby Wipes is the absence of alcohol in their formulation. This is a huge advantage, especially for babies with sensitive skin. The wipes are incredibly gentle and soothing, without any stinging or irritation. As a parent, I appreciate that these wipes are designed with the utmost care for delicate skin, keeping my baby comfortable and happy during each use.The fact that these wipes are composed of 99% water is another remarkable aspect. This high water content ensures that the wipes are extremely hydrating and won't dry out or leave any residue on the skin. They provide a refreshing and clean sensation, leaving the skin feeling soft and moisturized. I also noticed that the wipes don't leave behind any sticky or greasy feeling, which is often a concern with other brands.The packaging of Cuddables Water Baby Wipes is convenient and well-designed. The resealable lid helps maintain the wipes' moisture, preventing them from drying out. The pack is also compact and easy to carry around, making it ideal for on-the-go situations or while traveling. The packaging design ensures quick and hassle-free access to the wipes whenever needed.In terms of scent, these wipes are essentially fragrance-free. While some might prefer scented wipes, the lack of added fragrance in Cuddables Water Baby Wipes is actually a positive attribute. It eliminates the risk of any potential irritants or allergens and makes them suitable for babies with sensitive noses or skin conditions.Overall, I am thoroughly impressed with Cuddables Water Baby Wipes. Their 3x thicker design, absence of alcohol, and high water content make them a top choice for parents looking for gentle, effective, and safe wipes for their little ones. The wipes are reliable, convenient, and provide a superior cleaning experience. I highly recommend giving Cuddables Water Baby Wipes a try and experiencing their exceptional quality for yourself.
Read more

product: Cuddables 99% Water Baby Wipes | Natural Plant made cloth wipes - Super thick | 72pcs X 2 Packs = 144 Wet Baby Wipes
title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent product 👍
body:
I recently purchased a package of cuddables baby wipes that are 99% purified water, cottony soft, and 3x thicker than regular wipes. As a new parent, I am always looking for products that are safe for my baby's delicate skin and free from harmful chemicals and artificial fragrances. After using these wipes for a few weeks, I must say that I am thoroughly impressed.First of all, the thickness of these wipes is noticeable compared to other brands I have used. They are strong and durable, which makes them perfect for cleaning up messes without tearing. The cottony soft texture is also a major plus - my baby's skin feels smooth and moisturized after each use.I appreciate that these wipes are made with 99% purified water and are free from harmful chemicals and artificial fragrances. This gives me peace of mind knowing that I am not exposing my baby to any unnecessary toxins or irritants. The fact that they are safe for newborns is also a huge selling point for me, as I can use them without worrying about any adverse reactions.Overall, I would highly recommend these baby wipes to any parent looking for a high-quality and safe product to use on their baby's delicate skin. They are effective at cleaning up messes, gentle on skin, and provide peace of mind knowing that they are made with safe and natural ingredients.

I am using this towel for my baby from last 2 months and I really want to share my thoughts on this product. This is the best towel for your baby’s bathing, utterly soft and smooth feel. It’s absorbing capacity is very nice, feels like feather on skin.It’s hoody is also of very good quality, covers baby’s head completely after bath.I must say you should give it a try.
